cuepoints.caption: Let's review the terminal Cancellation and Reprint functions.
Some draw game tickets may be cancelled according to game rules. Let's review how to cancel a ticket now.
From the Home Screen, I'll touch Cancel Online.
Here I can scan the ticket barcode or
or enter the ticket serial number manually
and touch Submit.
I'll scan the ticket barcode.
A Confirmation window displays the ticket serial number and the ticket amount.
I'll confirm the information is correct and touch OK.
The Mini Display in the lower right of the screen shows the amount to be refunded to the player.
I'll touch Total
and the Total Screen displays the amount to refund to the player.
A Cancel receipt will print.
I'll touch Clear to return to the Home Screen.
Now let's look at Reprints.
You may also run into a situation where you need to reprint a ticket that has torn, mis-printed, or been damaged in some way when printing.
Reprints are receipts for recent terminal transactions that may be needed for in-store accounting.
Reprints are not valid tickets and are clearly marked.
Touching the Reprints button
displays the Reprints sub-menu.
There are several reprint options you can choose from.
Last Transaction lets you print a receipt for the most recent transaction processed by the terminal.
Last Play is used to print a receipt for the last draw game wager.
Last Online Cash and Last Instant Game Cash are used to print a receipt for the last validation for each game type.
And finally Last Cancellation prints a receipt for the last cancellation.
Let's move on!
